page.title: 19ENTERTAINMENT IN WAKEFIELD
page.content: There is certainly no lack of entertainment in Wakefield. There is an endless list of pubs and clubs of which the most well known must be Casanovas, voted the best discotheque in the U.K. The public have also a wide choice of restaraunts and wine bars. The local cinema offers up to date films and charges very atractive prices for its viewers. There is seasonal entertainment in the form of festivals and at Christmas Wakefield is bustling with festive activities. Buskers perform in the Ridings Shopping Centre and concerts take place in Church halls and schools. In summer there are fairs, circuses, flower shows and a variety of outdoor entertainments in Wakefields parks and open spaces. For entertainment Wakefield is certainly where you want to be!
